name: Tradenest
desc: I architected a scalable application with NodeJs , ReactJs and Laravel integrating real-time stock tracking,dynamic watchlists, and group chat using Socket.IO. Users receive live stock updates, manage personalized watchlists, and engage in real-time discussions with fellow investors. Designed for performance and user engagement, my solution empowers informed investment decisions in a collaborative environment.

name: Mentorpeak
desc: I orchestrated MentorPeak's creation, harmonizing ReactJS, Node.js, Laravel, MongoDB, and MySQL to forge a dynamic global mentorship platform. Seamlessly fusing virtual and in-person connections, MentorPeak unites mentees with mentors across diverse domainsâ€”life, business, career, marketing, technology, and music. My adept ReactJS implementation ensured an intuitive interface, while Node.js and Laravel fortified the backend. Through MongoDB and MySQL, I optimized data-driven mentor-mentee pairings. I've contributed to a transformative platform propelling growth, learning, and networking globally. My technical finesse and seamless integration have shaped MentorPeak into a pivotal hub for knowledge exchange and personal advancement.
